title: Representation Learning for Distributional Perturbation Extrapolation
details: J von Kügelgen, J Ketterer, X Shen, N Meinshausen… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2025
abstract: We consider the problem of modelling the effects of unseen perturbations such as gene knockdowns or drug combinations on low-level measurements such as RNA sequencing data. Specifically, given data collected under some perturbations, we …
